message.content: {"given_definition_quality":93,"better_definition":"to drive a car","sentence":"女生开车。","image_prompt":"A simple soft apocalypse animation style: a young woman driving a car, with visible wind outside the window, gentle pastel colors, dreamy atmosphere, subtle hints of an otherworldly landscape, focus on the woman at the steering wheel, minimalistic yet expressive, clearly showing she is the one driving.","sentence_translation":"The girl is driving a car."}
